episode.title: Tommy Got Made
episode.rawTitle: 126: ‘Tommy Got Made’ With Guest Jason Snell
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Jason Snell returns to the show, with a lot to talk about: Pebble's new Pebble Time smartwatch, the "Safari is the New IE" argument, the state of web advertising (and its adverse effects on performance and privacy) and monetization, and more.
